message.name: ERR_ABSENCEPERIOD_FV_UNITS_NOT_ATTENDED_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_ZERO
message.locale: Units Not Attended must be greater than 0.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCEPERIOD_XRV_ABSENCE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_FROM_DATE_OF_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: Absence Date, %1d, must be on or after the Service From date of the roster line item, %2d.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCEPERIOD_XRV_ABSENCE_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_TO_DATE_OF_ROSTER_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: Absence Date, %1d, must be on or before the Service To date of the roster line item, %2d.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCEPERIOD_XFV_PERIOD_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PERIOD_END_DATE
message.locale: The Period Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the Period End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_ABSENCEPERIOD_XFV_PERIOD_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_PERIOD_START_DATE
message.locale: The Period End Date, %1d, must be on or after the Period Start Date, %2d.
